mapper.select: select u.name as userName, u.edate as userEdate, u.grade as star, u.content as userContent, a.edate as storeEdate, a.content as storeContent from review u left join review a on u.rs_idx = a.parent left join reservation r on u.idx = r.idx where u.parent is null and u.status=1 and r.storeid = #{userid} order by useredate desc
